info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 27 at 12:02AM CDT until September 27 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 1201 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pana, or 7 miles northeast of Nokomis, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Pana around 1205 AM CDT. Tower Hill around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rosamond and Oconee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
